text: Giovanni Reale (15 April 1931 â€“ 15 October 2014) was an Italian historian and philosopher. Reale was born in Candia Lomellina, Pavia, Italy. He mostly wrote about Greek philosophy. He was a teacher at Vita-Salute San Raffaele University in Italy. Reale died on 15 October 2014 in his home in Luino, Italy, aged 83.La Stampa ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Italian writers Category:Italian educators Category:Italian historians Category:People from Lombardy
title: Giovanni Reale
